name: The Amazing Game 3.0
description:
Come to try our WONDERFUL game!

It is so GREAT and CHEAP!
Don't be afraid and try it out!

The concept is to caricature the bad behaviour of video game editors about casualisation and monetization. 99% Home made assets!

This is our first Ludum Dare, and we are pretty glad about the result.
The team was created specifically for this event and we didn't know at all how it would work out.
But this Ludum Dare was an amazing experience and here it is!
Have fun on it =)

Team :

- Odd

- Akadream

- DjeyCreations

Tools :
